paragraphs.body: Featured articles are articles that have been or are featured on the main page. These are articles of excellent quality that have been chosen to enhance their visibility. The status is not removable. This is in contrast to ${link_0}, which are articles written to a very high standard and have been promoted by the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Featured articles are articles that have been or are featured on the main page. These are articles of excellent quality that have been chosen to enhance their visibility. The status is not removable. This is in contrast to A-class articles, which are articles written to a very high standard and have been promoted by the Standards Council.

paragraphs.body: Featured articles are chosen by a monthly vote. Nominated articles must already be A- or B-class articles.
